title: Utilizing perhalopyridine-based alkynes as suitable precursors for the synthesis of novel poly(1,2,3-triazolyl)-substituted perhalopyridines
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30873-30885
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05861E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Fereshteh Khorasani, Reza Ranjbar-Karimi, Kazem Mohammadiannejad
A novel series of poly(1,2,3-triazolyl)-substituted perhalopyridines were synthesized under ultrasonic irradiation. We also developed an effective method for the preparation of ((1,2,3-triazol-4-yl)methoxy)-3,4,5,6-tetrachloropyridines.
